product_name: Big Agnes Q-Core SL Sleeping Pad - Mummy
long_description: With an R-Value of 5 and weighing in at only 1 lb., the Big Agnes Q-Core SL delivers lots of warmth without slowing you down on the trail. X-Static synthetic insulation increases the R-Value to 5 for a warm night's sleep; silver filament in the insulation adds antimicrobial properties to help keep odors at bay. Also includes an internal heat-reflective polyurethane coating to limit radiant heat loss. Alternating I-Beam construction creates a smooth, comfortable feel. Durable, superlight nylon ripstop on the top and bottom stands up to use in the outdoors. Comfort range to 35degF. The Big Agnes Q-Core SL sleeping pad includes a stuff sack and repair kit.
short_description: With an R-Value of 5 and weighing in at only 1 lb., the Big Agnes Q-Core SL delivers lots of warmth without slowing you down on the trail.
